about_the_game:
In order to escape the dungeon, the girl unseals the demon. This action is wrong and fatal, she does not get the demon's gratitude, on the contrary, the girl is in extreme danger. Will the poor girl be able to outrun the demon and escape this horrible place alive?


It is a side-scrolling action game. The characteristic of this game is that you need to run as fast as possible. Because if you are too slow, the monster will catch up with you and eat you.


Failure doesn't get you down, and you're confident that you'll find a way to cope with it the next time. You will truly feel strong.


As a side-scrolling action game, the character will have common abilities such as rolling, continuous jumping, climbing walls, etc. Our protagonist will have none of them missing. And at the beginning of the game, you will have all the abilities, and you won't leave any regrets.


The game includes 2 difficulties and 140 levels. There are countless mechanisms and secret paths. Each level is carefully crafted and tested. It won't be too difficult to make you feel helpless, nor too easy to make you bored.


All in all, I'd say it's a good piece of game. I hope it brings you joy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: Intel 2Core 2.8G or AMD 2Core 3.0G
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 640 or AMD R7 250 or Intel hd 4600 (720p)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 , 8 , 10 , 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD R7 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card

short_description: This is a platform action game with various traps and tons of levels for players to challenge!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Russian, Hungarian, Czech, Polish, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Danish, Bulgarian, Indonesian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Swedish, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese
